CustomField.description: Monthly Net Operating Income. Formula is the revenue generated by the properties minus the operating expenses. IF( ISBLANK(Verified_Rent__c), Monthly_Rent__c, Verified_Rent__c) - Monthly_Total_Expenses__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Monthly Net Operating Income. Formula is the revenue generated by the properties minus the operating expenses.
CustomField.label: Monthly NOI
